description: This source file defines the NotesRepository class responsible for managing note data, including loading, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes, with persistence handled via FileNotesDataSource.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: Repository for managing notes with in-memory cache and persistence.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Returns all notes sorted by last updated time descending.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its ID, or null if not found.

methods.name: upsert
methods.description: Adds a new note or updates an existing one, then saves the notes to storage.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID, returning true if deletion was successful.
